title: Johto Region
description: Play with hundreds of other players in this self paced style Play by Post Discord server!

title: Ptole Region
description: Join the Trainers of the Egypt-Inspired Ptole Region in a Pokémon 5e Tabletop MMORPG experience!

title: Pen & Pokemon
description: Pen and Pokémon Roleplay is a server with a wide variety of games from long lasting campaigns to One-Shots.
